SharedListActivity
          Class to represent common behaviors and aspects of Pomodroid's ListActivities It defines the shared Menu, an ArrayAdapter to represent Activities, and the methods useful to work with the Adapter.

          A customized ArrayAdapter for representing lists of Activities.
